scripts.start: echo 'Starting build process...' && npm run start-backend
scripts.build-frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && cd ../front && echo 'Variables disponibles:' && env && echo 'Variables disponibles 2:' && env | grep REACT_APP && npm install && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build completed' && cd ../back && mkdir -p ./public && cp -r ../front/dist/* ./public/ && echo 'Files copied to back/public directory successfully'
scripts.start-backend: echo 'Starting backend server...' && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
